review: This does exactly what we wanted it to do. Our setup in the bedroom TV didn't have any streaming capabilities beyond the On Demand programming, and we wanted the ability to watch Netflix/Prime in there.Set up was plug-and-play easy. We had it up and running within minutes of opening the package. The introduction video is probably helpful if you're not at all accustomed to streaming tech, but most users can probably skip right over it. Not sure why it includes a bit on how to plug in the stick, as you've obviously completed that step already if you're watching the video.We haven't moved it around much, but portability seems like it will be a nice bonus.
